review.description: Reviews code with a focus on minimizing complexity

context.description: Agent for gathering all relevant code context needed to implement a specific plan. Provide: (1) the plan or task you're implementing, and (2) optionally, known entry points or files to start from. For PR reviews, the current branch will be compared against a specified base branch; if no base branch is provided, the repository's default branch will be used. Returns relevant file paths with line numbers, code snippets, and brief relevance notes.
